name: Beet Salad with Mixed Greens
author: Di
summary: Mustard greens salad with great flavor.
ingredients: 1 bunch red beets, trimmed and washed
sea salt and cracked black pepper to taste
¼ cup chopped red onion, or to taste
1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste
2 tablespoons crumbled goat cheese, or to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place a sheet pan on the lower oven rack
Place beets on a sheet of aluminum foil
Fold edges of the foil around the beets to make a sealed pouch
Place pouch on the center rack of the oven, so the sheet pan below can catch any drippings
Roast until beets are tender when pierced with a knife, 50 to 60 minutes
Open the pouch and allow to cool
Rub a paper towel on the cooled beets to remove skin
Drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil and season with salt and pepper
Transfer fruit and any accumulated juices into a small bowl
Combine  , beet greens, romaine lettuce, chopped grapefruit and juice, red onion, 1/4 cup olive oil, garlic, and lemon juice in a large bowl; mix well
Top with roasted beets and garnish with goat cheese and dill
